tasks.label: Compile and Run Java
args: SRC="${fileDirname}/${fileBasenameNoExtension}.java"; WS="${workspaceFolder}"; PKG_PATH="${fileDirname}"; PKG_PATH="${PKG_PATH#"$WS"/}"; PKG_PATH="${PKG_PATH#./}"; PKG_PATH="${PKG_PATH//\//.}"; FQCN="${fileBasenameNoExtension}"; if [ -n "$PKG_PATH" ]; then FQCN="$PKG_PATH.$FQCN"; fi; javac "$SRC" && java -cp "$WS" "$FQCN" < "${fileDirname}/inputs/input.txt" > "${fileDirname}/inputs/output.txt" && echo 'â†ª Wrote output to inputs/output.txt'
